divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Riviera Drive and I happen to randomly look up at the clear baby blue sky. There were many birds flying around. Then I saw a very shinny silvery object that was not moving. It looked like a giant gum drop from afar. Or rather a bell shape object. I continued driving and then my view was blocked by a tree then I was able to see it again after I passed the tree and it moved quickly to the right and then out of no where, it disappeared. There were no clouds or airplanes in the sky. I was surprised at first. I wasn't scared or worried. I just accepted it.
Summary: It was a bell shape. Very shinny and silver.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Coral Gables
There were no other sightings in Coral Gables on or around February 4th 2009
